detaileddescription.para: Generates the SELECT portion of the query
Generates a SELECT MAX(field) portion of a query
Generates a SELECT MIN(field) portion of a query
Generates a SELECT AVG(field) portion of a query
Generates a SELECT SUM(field) portion of a query
Sets a flag which tells the query string compiler to add DISTINCT
Generates the FROM portion of the query

parameterdescription.para: can be a string or array

detaileddescription.para: Generates the JOIN portion of the query
Generates the WHERE portion of the query. Separates multiple calls with AND
Generates the WHERE portion of the query. Separates multiple calls with OR
Generates a WHERE field IN ('item', 'item') SQL query joined with AND if appropriate
Generates a WHERE field IN ('item', 'item') SQL query joined with OR if appropriate
Generates a WHERE field NOT IN ('item', 'item') SQL query joined with AND if appropriate
Generates a WHERE field NOT IN ('item', 'item') SQL query joined with OR if appropriate
Generates a LIKE% portion of the query. Separates multiple calls with AND
Generates a NOT LIKE portion of the query. Separates multiple calls with AND
Generates a LIKE% portion of the query. Separates multiple calls with OR
Generates a NOT LIKE portion of the query. Separates multiple calls with OR
The "set" function. Allows key/value pairs to be set for inserting or updating
Compiles the select statement based on the other functions called and runs the query
Generates a platform-specific query string that counts all records returned by an Active Record query.
Allows the where clause, limit and offset to be added directly
Compiles batch insert strings and runs the queries

parameterdescription.para: the table to retrieve the results from
an associative array of insert values

detaileddescription.para: The "set_insert_batch" function. Allows key/value pairs to be set for batch inserts
Compiles an insert string and runs the query

parameterdescription.para: the table to insert data into
an associative array of insert values

detaileddescription.para: Compiles an replace into string and runs the query

parameterdescription.para: the table to replace data into
an associative array of insert values

detaileddescription.para: Compiles an update string and runs the query

parameterdescription.para: the table to retrieve the results from
an associative array of update values

detaileddescription.para: Compiles an update string and runs the query

parameterdescription.para: the table to retrieve the results from
an associative array of update values

detaileddescription.para: The "set_update_batch" function. Allows key/value pairs to be set for batch updating
Compiles a delete string and runs "DELETE FROM table"
Compiles a truncate string and runs the query If the database does not support the truncate() command This function maps to "DELETE FROM table"
Compiles a delete string and runs the query

parameterdescription.para: the table(s) to delete from. String or array

detaileddescription.para: Prepends a database prefix if one exists in configuration
Set's the DB Prefix to something new without needing to reconnect
Takes an object as input and converts the class variables to array key/vals
Takes an object as input and converts the class variables to array key/vals
Processing Function for the four functions above:
Determines the alias name based on the table
Called by where_in, where_in_or, where_not_in, where_not_in_or

parameterdescription.para: If the statement would be IN or NOT IN

detaileddescription.para: Used to track SQL statements written with aliased tables.
Generates a query string based on which functions were used. Should not be called directly. The get() function calls it.
When called, this function merges any cached AR arrays with locally called ones.
Resets the active record values. Called by the get() function

parameterdescription.para: An array of fields to reset

detaileddescription.para: Resets the active record values. Called by the get() function
Called by the insert() update() insert_batch() update_batch() and delete() functions
